Description: A system that collects currency rates from  Ukrainian banks daily, stores them in a database, and displays them on a modern one-page website.
Create a full list of functional requirements for the currency tracking system.
Document performance, usability, reliability, maintainability, and portability requirements.
Create SQLite database schema with exchange_rates table for storing bank rates.
Write Python parser for PrivatBank API and save collected rates to database.
Write Python parser for Monobank API and save collected rates to database.
Develop parser for NBU currency rates and integrate into data pipeline.
Set up APScheduler to collect data once per day automatically.
Create a modern one-page interface with a currency rates table using HTML, JS, Tailwind.
Log errors, handle missing data, API downtime, and unexpected responses.
Create test cases and test backend, frontend, and parsing logic.
